threat: A local attacker may use this issue to brute-force CryptedFileKeyring keyring files.
A local attacker could use this issue to access keyring files belonging to other users..
special:
The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:
In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
This update uses a new upstream release, which includes additional bug
fixes, and will migrate existing keyring files to the new format upon first
use.
